item.description:
Hi Folks,

Like I mentioned in my earlier email, this debate meeting on free will is in preparation for the next one coming up on confabulation theory.

- In this Sept.11 meeting, John C will lead the charge for the free-will-ers - of course with backup from anyone who wants to weigh in.

- I might lead the counter-point (i.e., the anti-free-will-ers) but my guess is there will be so many anti-free-will-ers with their say to have that they won't need my voice in the mix. (Thus, I might just relax and watch the show)

In the subsequent meeting (to be scheduled) John C and I will jointly present confabulation theory (an interesting computational model of cognition). Stay tuned for that one.

Hopefully we can hold the Sept.11 meeting in our usual place:

Conference room 5th floor, 53 Bay State Road.

See you there!
Sean
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send out an email to attendees a few days before the meeting

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Next meetup: You have no choice but to believe in free will
